9:28 We seldom see JHope crying on stage. If he cried, he would laugh & smile at the same time. But these moments just goes to show how much it means to him. Make me wonder how much trial & tribulation he had to go through. In trainees days, I wonder if BigHit thought they had made the right decision because his point at that time was only his dancing. Now he sings, dance, raps & write songs. How much he had grown & how much he had to bury to put those smiles on his face.
